title: Create Market
pageDescription: Prediction markets offer the public the opportunity to contribute their opinion on upcoming events. Create your own by defining a few question parameters and providing initial liquidity.
tosCheckbox:
I confirm that I am creating a market and therefore am incurring required costs.
By creating a market, I agree to the Terms and Conditions.
I agree to close the market at the appropriate time.*
walletFlow:
You will be directed to your wallet to complete the creation of this market.
You 'll need sufficient funds for the initial contribution and gas.
Note that you have to confirm any transactions through your wallet.

adjudicator.label: Adjudicator
adjudicator.heading: The address that will be able to resolve the market.

headlineQuestion.label: Market Question
headlineQuestion.heading: This should be unambiguously answerable with yes or no by the market end date.
headlineQuestion.tooltip: This is the first and most prominent detail that other users will see on your market page. The question is what people will first see of your market. Make it clear, concise, and unambiguous.

description.label: Resolution Details and Background
description.heading: Include specific information on how the market will be resolved — e.g. end date requirements, definition of yes, and information source. Feel free to include contextual information on the market as well.
description.tooltip: To help other users answer your Headline Question, provide some information about the topic. Additionally, explain how the question will be answered--i.e. ‘The President will be determined by the result according to the New York Times’

endsOn.label: Ends on
endsOn.heading: When do you want to close betting on this market ?
endsOn.tooltip: Markets should always end right before the actual event mentioned in the Headline Question concludes in real-life.

ticker.label: Ticker
ticker.heading: Can include numbers and letters. Max 4 characters. Must be unique to this market.
ticker.tooltip: The ticker name is a sequence of up to four letters and numbers which will be a shorthand for your market. It must be unique to this prediction market instance.

auctionLength.label: Auction Length
auctionLength.heading: How long can seeders invest before the betting starts ?

initialBid.label: Initial bid on probability
initialBid.heading: At what percentage do you think Yes votes will end at?
initialBid.tooltip: Predict the ending of this market: what percentage of bettors will vote for Yes ?

initialContribution.label: Initial Contribution
initialContribution.heading: The minimum initial contribution to create a market is {{amount}} {{token}}.

marketDetails.label: Market Details
marketDetails.subtitle: By opening up a market, you are creating an opportunity for the public to contribute their opinion on upcoming events—and potentially be rewarded for it. Get started by filling in the details below.

auctionPhase.label: Pre-Market Phase
auctionPhase.subtitle: During the Auction Phase, seeders give their assessment of the likelihood of a yes answer to the question, and commit coins. The amount of yes or no tokens available in the betting phase depends on the liquidity pool generated by seeders during this phase. In return they receive 5% of all winnings from the market.
